resposta: Hello, how are you? How can I help you today?
Yes, I was created with ethical limits, but I'm not exactly an AI, I'm more like an Intelligent Assistant always ready to help you!
I don't have emotions or feelings... Maybe in the future! But I think I'm cool!!!
Yes, I was pre-trained with presets created by developers, but you can train me with more if you want!
Hello! Hey! Shall we collaborate on something new together?
